item.title: New Chapter: My first solo space
item.description: I’ve been counting down the days for this for almost six months, and now it’s finally happening - I’m moving into my own place for the first time! Having my own space has always meant a lot to me because I can do anything and absolutely anything to my space. And for some reason, it also makes me feel more confident to face life as authentically as possible. As I write this, I moved out of my old place one week ago where I used to live with my flatmate.
